content: key features instant access upon purchase you ll receive immediate access to download your pdf pattern allowing you to start crocheting right away detailed instructions our pattern includes clear and concise instructions including step-by-step photos and a crochet chart skill level intermediate whether you re making them for yourself as a thoughtful handmade gift or to sell at craft fairs this pattern is as fun to make as it is to wear note this listing is for a digital download of the pattern not the finished wrist warmers add a touch of floral charm to your winter projects get the pattern now and start crocheting today pattern details skill level intermediate language eng format pdf pages 15 materials needed worsted weight yarn crochet hook size recommended in pattern yarn needle scissors this pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com 1 the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy-to-read printable and ad-free version of the pattern 1 https //www stitching-together com/crochet-wrist-warmers-free-pattern/
